title: Yatri Sathi - Cab Booking App
description:
Welcome to Yatri Sathi, the official cab booking app by the Government of West Bengal. Book your cab hassle-free and experience convenient transportation in Kolkata. With Yatri Sathi, you can easily find registered and verified cab drivers, enjoy transparent pricing, and experience secure rides.

Key Features:
✓ Hassle-Free Booking: Book a cab in just a few taps with our intuitive interface.
✓ Verified Cab Drivers: Travel with peace of mind as all our drivers are registered and thoroughly screened.
✓ Transparent Pricing: No surprises! Get upfront fare estimates for complete transparency.
✓ Multiple Payment Options: Pay conveniently with cash or UPI.
✓ Quick Dispatch: Enjoy prompt cab dispatches and minimize your waiting time.
✓ Local Language Support: Use Yatri Sathi in Bengali or English for a comfortable user experience.

Why Choose Yatri Sathi?
✓ Government-Backed: Trust the official cab booking app launched by the Government of West Bengal.
✓ Affordable Fares: Experience budget-friendly fares and cost-effective travel options in Kolkata.
✓ 24/7 Customer Support: Our dedicated customer support team is ready to assist you round the clock.

Download Yatri Sathi now and discover the convenience of booking cabs for your daily commutes, airport transfers, city tours, and more.

summary: Reliable, Affordable, and Safe Cabs in Kolkata

developerLegalAddress: 6Th Floor, Module C And D, Block Ep And Gp, Moni Bhandar, Street Number 19, Webel Bhavan, Salt Lake Sector-V, Bidhan, Kolkata, West Bengal 700091, India
